__e: If he finds he can do more, by and by, I dare say he will.
I don't want you to. But it happens sometimes, you know.
Well, if I don't die, tell her she's a tramp and she's living with a guy... the best you could say about him is sometimes he returns phone calls.
I tell them, as I am telling you, that in this fallen world, sometimes one must take life to preserve life.
You know, sometimes, we do what we got to do to get the job done.
Sometimes you want what's in front of you to work so bad that you don't see what's right there beside you.
Sometimes I feel like shouting Why don't you do it?
Sometimes... I get... I get this kind of memory of her.
But still,sometimes it gets turned around in my head somehow.
Sometimes I say that if I could have parents, I'd be like other kids.
When I was at home with family, friends,... sometimes I did.
You know, sometimes I think I know so little about you that I think I'm in love with a ghost...
Sometimes when you're in a car accident, and you wear your seatbelt like you're supposed to, the belt can hurt your tummy.
Sometimes when I'm out on the porch, just sitting around doing nothing, hell... it sure does get real quiet around here.
Sometimes, when you see the body of someone you know, someone you've seen move before, you want them to move.
I mean, yeah, it made her crazy, but sometimes the things that we love the most make us the craziest because we love them.
Sometimes women have their own, little things we buy, but a man, a rich man, having his own account... doesn't move me.
I-I tried to tell him that... sometimes people get hurt.
